name: @perspect3vism/ad4m-integration-tests
description: Node.js package that allows the running/interfacing of AD4M Languages & Perspectives.

scripts.test: node scripts/cleanTestingData.js && yarn run prepare-test && yarn run test-all && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test:windows: yarn run prepare-test:windows && yarn run test-all && node scripts/cleanTestingData.js
scripts.test-all: yarn run test-simple && yarn run test-app && yarn run test-auth && yarn run test-integration && yarn run test-prolog-and-literals
scripts.prepare-test:macos: ./scripts/build-test-language.sh && ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.sh && node scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && yarn run inject-language-language && yarn run publish-test-languages && yarn run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.prepare-test:linux: ./scripts/build-test-language.sh && ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.sh && node scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && yarn run inject-language-language && yarn run publish-test-languages && yarn run inject-publishing-agent
scripts.prepare-test:windows: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/build-test-language.ps1 && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/prepareTestDirectory.ps1 && node scripts/get-builtin-test-langs.js && yarn run inject-language-language && yarn run publish-test-languages && yarn run inject-publishing-agent
